data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 82 believers in the state of Daykundi to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Daykundi, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Daykundi. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Daykundi with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Daykundi.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Baloch, Western people. Make the Baloch, Western people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Daykundi, Afghanistan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 516,518 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Daykundi.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Daykundi, Afghanistan has a population of 516,600.

We estimate Daykundi has 82 people who might know Jesus, 16 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 516,502 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,299 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Daykundi, Afghanistan know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
